name: Alien Invasion (itch) (Robin van Nunen)
description:
Alien Invasion has only one simple goal: Stay alive as long as possible.

To do that you have to kill the aliens with your weapon and survive through each wave.

Use your mouse to aim and shoot and W A S D to move.

Health Pickups Are randomly spawned throughout the game.
Little hint: move around to find them, they will not spawn near you.

Have Fun!
